title: The Grizzly bear: a case study in field research
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Irwin Rosten
brief_description: Scientists Frank and john Craighead roam Yellowstone National Park armed with drug filled darts in order to study the formidable grizzly. Narrated by Alexander Scourby.
